data.name: Marincess Sleepy Maiden
data.desc:
You can target 1 "Marincess" card you control; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, it gains this effect.
‚óè The targeted card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Marincess" Link Monster you control; equip 1 "Marincess" Link Monster from your GY to it. You can only use each effect of "Marincess Sleepy Maiden" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Duelists: Duels From the Deep
